original_text: When the Jews saw me in the temple, I was not arguing with anyone. I was not causing trouble among Jewish people in their meeting places. Nor did I cause problems in any other places in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 그들은 내가 성전에서 누구와 변론하는 것이나 회당 또는 시중에서 무리를 소동하게 하는 것을 보지 못하였으니

sentences.original_text: When the Jews saw me in the temple
I was not arguing with anyone
I was not causing trouble among Jewish people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 유대인들 사이에서 소란을 일으키지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: Nor did I cause problems in any other places
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 다른 어떤 장소에서도 문제를 일으키지 않았습니다
